column1: So a seven judge Bench of the present Supreme Court, that came after 1978

column2: It does not have the power of restitutio in integrum
Its power of revision is very rarely exercised
All references to the Supreme Court prior to 07th September 1978 are to
In Menchinahamy vs. Muniweera, 1951, Dias S. P.J., (one of the finest
judges this country produced) exercised the power of restitutio in
integrum to set aside the judgment of the Supreme Court itself
